Record.ClassificationPath: Virus Diseases/RNA Virus Infections/Flaviviridae Infections/Pestivirus Infections/Hemorrhagic Syndrome, Bovine
Record.Description: Clinically severe acute disease of cattle caused by noncytopathic forms of Bovine viral diarrhea virus 2 (DIARRHEA VIRUS 2, BOVINE VIRAL). Outbreaks are characterized by high morbidity and high mortality.
